About us

Our shop offers flatware made of stainless steel in different colors. Six are provided: golden, silver, purple, blue, black, light yellow. A set for any number of people is also available

Benefits

Free delivery

We provide free delivery throughout the USA

Payment security

Our website uses PayPal payment system, which helps you to make your payments comfortably

Goods safety

Each piece of flatware is delivered in an individual plastic bag, which protects the goods from damage

Delivery control

Within 2 days you will receive a link via e-mail and following it you will be able to track your product

Faq

It is not a problem to find the answer to such a question. If you cannot find the answer in the list, you can e-mail us and we will solve your problem

How to pay?

Payment on our website is made through PayPal payment system. You only need to fill in the data necessary for delivery, as well as the details that the payment system will require and click the “pay” button

Delivery?

We provide free delivery throughout the USA. The goods come to the post indicated by the ZIP code that you mention. Courier delivery is not carried out by our store

What to do if I received damaged goods?

If you received damaged items, you can return them. To do this you have to send photos which clearly show the damage to our e-mail within 24 hours after receiving the goods. Please indicate the letter subject as “Return”

Can I order a particular piece from a set?

We highly value our clients, so we can provide such an opportunity. Please contact us via e-mail and we will help you
